channel.title: [317] ZeroScape V2.0 [RELEASE]
channel.description:
[size=20pt][b]ZeroScape V2.0 Packaged[/b][/size] [b]- Contains a small anti-leech this time.[/b]
[size=14pt][u][b]Pictures![/b][/u][/size] - Pictures are from V1.0!
[img]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/913/zshome.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/853/aereckzz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/503/dclawzz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/1658/defresetzz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/2096/huezz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/1050/vengzz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/176/slayerzz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/5494/womz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/1128/skillzz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img301.imageshack.us/img301/9677/allxgrg.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt][u][b]Features![/b][/u][/size] - Vengeance 100%! Only 1 vengeance per 30 seconds! - Nice home with shops! - Dragon Claws Special 100%! - Skill Area (not all skills in V1.0) - Skillcape seller dont sell (t) if only one 99, or not at all. - Good starter (remember, it is pk server!;P) - Donator rank, with [i]Donator crown[/i]! - Godsword stances! - Dragon Claw stances! - Genie can reset players defence level! - Father Aereck give out barrage rune and food! - Wise Old Man counts your 99 skills! - Skill masters at Skill Area! Sell Skillcapes for 99,000 gp! - EXP Lock! Can be toggled in settings tab! - Cool old (deleted all nulls) pure shop! New NPC! - Ability to mute players by IP address! - Ability to ban players by IP address! - TzTok-Jad! Based on heightlevel (cannot team him!) - Godwars! General Graador, good drops! - Normal Magic, Ancient and Lunar 98%! - Lots of fun! Download for rest of features! - Crate at Staff zone [b]*NEW*[/b] - NPC's in Pest Control [b]*NEW*[/b] - Fixed the shops at home + 1 new [b]*NEW*[/b] - Packaged the server [b]*NEW*[/b]
[size=14pt][u][b]Important![/b][/u][/size] As some noobs leeched my source, and said they had coded it all- I added a anti-leech.. Sorry guys, next version may be without if I dont see any leechers on this version:) DONT do Ctrl+H to change [i]Zero[/i] with you'r name! After that server wont accept logins.. Change one for one and it wont be a problem =)
[size=14pt][u][b]Server Download (V2.0)[/b][/u][/size] Click [url=http://uppit.com/v/56B35S56]here[/url] to download!
[size=14pt][u][b]Client Download (V1.0)[/b][/u][/size] Click [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?of25lnfnz3w]here[/url] to download!
___________________________________________________________
[b][u][size=10pt]Client Credits![/size][/u][/b] - 40%: Drachtpkz123 (Johnny) - 30%: Owner of ElitePK V1.0 - 30%: Blurr
[b][u][size=10pt]Server Credits![/size][/u][/b] - 50%: `ZeroScape - 20%: _Delta - 30%: Devolution
___________________________________________________________ Want to donate? PayPal - davew@live.no! Thank you soo much! ___________________________________________________________
[size=16pt][font=Verdana][b]Downloaded?? PLEASE ADD A QUICK LITTLE COMMENT:D![/b][/font][/size]
